author: Special Correspondent
text:
Considering the pleas of farmers in the Cauvery delta region, who were planting crops in a delayed manner, Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Wednesday has ordered the release of water from the Mettur dam till February 25. Everyday 6,000 cubic feet per second of water would be released for irrigation.

In a statement, she said usually water from the dam is let out only till January 28. The dam was opened on August 9, 2015. Around 70,000 acres require irrigation at present.
title: Water release ordered
